Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ・酒場
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka - Tavern

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場
Entry.EnglishText: Tavern

Entry.JapaneseText: <icon:20> つまみ食い
Entry.EnglishText: <icon:20>Sneak a Bite

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たち国民のために 挨拶してくださるなんて、 ホント、感謝感激雨アラレだわ。
Entry.EnglishText: We citizens are so grateful that the Queen would deign to bless us with her presence.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、絶対、 お城へ見に行くんだから！ ええ絶対よ、絶対。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm for sure going to go to the castle! Eyup, I'm gonna go...

Entry.JapaneseText: お城に無断で侵入するなんて、 大それた事をする奴の顔を 拝んでみたいものだわね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'd like to see what someone who would be crazy enough to sneak into the castle looks like.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、どんな顔かしら？ 意外と男前だったりするのかしら？ あら……女かもしれないわねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: I really do wonder... Would he be unexpectedly handsome? Oh, wait... It could have been a woman...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ……ガジュマ……！ ああ、やだやだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma! Oh, I can't stand you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと仲良くするなんて ヒューマの恥よ！ あっち行って！
Entry.EnglishText: Shame on you for being friendly with a Gajuma! Get away from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族なんて関係ないって 勝手な事を 言う人もいるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: There are people who say that things like race don't matter...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと仲良くなんて できないわよねえ？
Entry.EnglishText: But I just can't get along with Gajuma, you see?

Entry.JapaneseText: 理由なんてないわよ！ ガジュマはキライなの！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need a reason to hate Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが醜いとか、 憎たらしいとか、そんなの 理由が必要なの!?
Entry.EnglishText: Is saying that they're ugly and mean really all that necessary?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここには薬はないわよ？ お酒とお料理ならあるけど。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no medicine here. Although, there is food and booze.

Entry.JapaneseText: もっとも夜にならないと 出せないけどね。 また夜にいらっしゃい。
Entry.EnglishText: But they don't serve that until night comes. You should stop by later.

Entry.JapaneseText: それでねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: I see...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのために薬を探した ヒューマの娘がいたって ホントウかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if there was really a Huma girl who was looking for medicine for a Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: どういうつもりなのよね？ ほっとけば、ガジュマが 少なくなったって言うのに……
Entry.EnglishText: Why would she do that? If she just let them be, then we would've been down one more Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 理由なんてないわよ！ ガジュマはキライなの！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need a reason to hate Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが醜いとか、 憎たらしいとか、そんなの 理由が必要なの!?
Entry.EnglishText: Is saying that they're ugly and mean really all that necessary?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマがキライな理由が わかったわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: I finally understand why I hate Gajuma...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマは まったく違う生き物なのよ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's because Huma and Gajuma are completely different living things!

Entry.JapaneseText: それを同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>だ、なんて言うから なんだかイヤになるのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: To say that they are my fellow <Yellow>Man<White> is something that I can't stand...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、酔ってるんだわ…… こんなヘンな音が、ずっと 聞こえてるなんて……！
Entry.EnglishText: I must be drunk... I can't stop hearing this strange noise...!

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、あなたも聞こえてる？ 酔ってるからって、 バカにしないでちょうだい！
Entry.EnglishText: What, you hear it too? Don't go messing with me just because I'm drunk!

Entry.JapaneseText: この国はどうなってるのよ！ もう、ワケがわからないわ！ こうなったらヤケ酒よ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's happening to this country?! Well, whatever it is, I'm going to drown my sorrows!

Entry.JapaneseText: 外に出れば、ガジュマが 文句ばかり言ってきて いやになっちゃうわ！
Entry.EnglishText: If I go out, all I hear is Gajuma complaining and I can't bear it!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、こうしてここで お食事したりお酒飲んだり するしか楽しみがないの！
Entry.EnglishText: So that's why the only thing I look forward to is coming here to eat and get some booze!

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様ってどんなに キレイなのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder how pretty the Queen is?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、あなたはどう思う？ 着飾った女王様を 早く見てみたいと思わない？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what do you think? Don't you want to see the Queen all dolled up?

Entry.JapaneseText: 思うでしょ？ ねえ、思うでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Well? Don't you agree?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんかマヌケな賊が いたんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard some stupid thieves entered the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: 堂々と入り込んで、 近衛兵に捕まったらしいわよ。 本当マヌケだわよね。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like they entered the castle in a grand fashion and got captured by the guards. What a bunch of morons.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう思わない？ 思うでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: You agree, right? ...Right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 話しかけないでくれる!? ガジュマを見るだけで ボコボコにしてやりたくなるのよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Could you not talk to me?! Just seeing a Gajuma makes me want to bust them up!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマって、どうにも 邪魔ったらしい存在ね！
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma are such a nuisance!

Entry.JapaneseText: 見てるだけでボコボコに してやりたくなるわ！ あなたもそう思わない!?
Entry.EnglishText: When I see them, I just want to bust them up! Don't you agree?!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんなのよ、あのジルバって女は!! ガジュマを殴らせない、ですって!? ヒューマは悪くないわよ！
Entry.EnglishText: What does that Zilva think she's doing! She's not going to let me beat up Gajuma?! We Huma aren't to blame for this!

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬が欲しいの？ それだったら、 あなた、西大陸の森の方へ 行けば確実よ。
Entry.EnglishText: You want medicine? Then you should go to the forest over on the western continent.

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ そんなとこまで行けない？ しょうがないわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? You're not willing to go that far? Then I guess you're not getting any...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのために、薬を 探してたヒューマの娘が いたんですって……
Entry.EnglishText: There was a Huma girl looking for medicine for a Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: その話を聞いて、なんだか ホッとしたんだけど…… どうしてかしらね？
Entry.EnglishText: I was a little relieved when I heard that... But I'm not sure why?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの悪口だけで、 アッと言う間に時間が過ぎるわ！
Entry.EnglishText: Time sure flies when you're talking trash about Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのために、薬を 探してたヒューマの娘が いたんですって……
Entry.EnglishText: There was a Huma girl looking for medicine for a Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: その話を聞いて、なんだか ホッとしたんだけど…… どうしてかしらね？
Entry.EnglishText: I was a little relieved when I heard that... But I'm not sure why?

Entry.JapaneseText: この音……私の気のせい？ それとも酔っ払ったせい？ でも、揺れてる……のかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not the only one hearing this noise, am I? Or maybe I'm just drunk? But the ground is shaking too... I think?

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの話、聞いた？ どうしたらいいの？ どこへ逃げればいいのよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Have you heard about Razilda? What should we do? Where can we run?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと仲良くしてた 自分が信じられないわ。 ほんと、信じられない……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't believe that I was ever friendly with Gajuma. I really can't...

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな儀式前で はしゃいじゃってさ。 昨日はこの店も大騒ぎだったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone is having a good time before the ceremony. We were busy yesterday as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんまりハメを外すと お上もウルサイからな……
Entry.EnglishText: But if things get out of control then the authorities are going to get a little heavy-handed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマに出す酒はねえよ！ とっとと帰りな！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not giving any alcohol to Gajuma! Get out right now!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが店に来ると、 羽やら毛やらで、汚くなっちまう。 まったく、目障りだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't matter whether they have fur or feathers, if a Gajuma stops by, they make a mess of the place. How unsightly.

Entry.JapaneseText: フン、ジルバ様が何と言おうと ガジュマが目障りなのは同じだ！ 酒はねえよ、帰りな！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what Lady Zilva says! Gajuma are all eyesores! I'm not giving you any alcohol, so go home!

Entry.JapaneseText: 『ガジュマお断り』って 張り紙を出したら、お上から すぐにやめろって警告された！
Entry.EnglishText: But when I tried to put up a sign saying "No Gajuma," the authorities told me to knock it off!

Entry.JapaneseText: まったくガジュマびいきで 腹が立つぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: This Gajuma favoritism is really pissing me off!

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒は百薬の長って言うけど…… 酒じゃ……ダメ、だよな……？
Entry.EnglishText: They say alcohol is the best medicine... Lemme guess, you don't want any alcohol...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、 薬が見つかったのか？ よかったな。
Entry.EnglishText: You found the medicine? That's good.

Entry.JapaneseText: フン、ジルバ様が何と言おうと ガジュマが目障りなのは同じだ！ 酒はねえよ、帰りな！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what Lady Zilva says! Gajuma are all eyesores! I'm not giving you any alcohol, so go home!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ガジュマお断り」って 張り紙を出したら、お上から すぐにやめろって警告された！
Entry.EnglishText: But when I tried to put up a sign saying "No Gajuma," the authorities told me to knock it off!

Entry.JapaneseText: まったくガジュマびいきで 腹が立つぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: This Gajuma favoritism is really pissing me off!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたには恨みはないけどな ガジュマに愛想ふりまける ような気分じゃないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't hold a grudge towards you, but I just can't bring myself to extend hospitality to Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだかよ、ガジュマの事を 色々考えてたら、イヤになったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't really like thinking about Gajuma that much.

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒でも飲まなきゃ やってられないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: But only alcohol can numb my thoughts...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか、ガタガタと揺れて 落ち着かないよ…… 酒のビンが落ちないか心配でな……
Entry.EnglishText: This shaking isn't subsiding... I'm worried that my bottles are going to fall over...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう、何もかもおしまいだ……！ これが、酒によっぱらって見た 夢……じゃないよな……
Entry.EnglishText: It's over finally! So it wasn't a dream I had after too much alcohol...

Entry.JapaneseText: 女三人寄ればかしましいって 言うけど……
Entry.EnglishText: They say that three women is a racket...

Entry.JapaneseText: うちは二人だけでも うるさいもんな……
Entry.EnglishText: But the two I have here are already pretty obnoxious...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『当店おすすめメニュー』 ・ノルゼン産 白ビール ・アカダマダケステーキ ・アカトゲサボテン焼き ・スールズ牛乳スープ
Entry.EnglishText: - Menu Recommendations - ・ Nolzen White Beer ・ Amber Jewel Steak ・ Grilled Redthorn Cactus ・ Sulz Milk Soup

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ♪ おいしそうなものがあるヨ！ ちょっと食べちゃおっと。
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh! Looks like there's something tasty here! Lemme take a teeny tiny bite...

Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Ate "<item:20000009>."

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:20000009>』がありました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>There's some "<item:20000009>" here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>……しかし、勝手に食べるのは どうかと思ったので遠慮しておきました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>...But stealing food is rude, so you refrained from doing so.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『<item:20000009>』 以前、<Mao>がつまみ食いをした。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0> - <item:20000009> - <Mao> already snuck a bite of this.

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬かい？ かたっぱしから店でも回ったら どうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: You need medicine? Have you tried stopping by every single store?

Entry.JapaneseText: お嬢さん、この街の 一人歩きは危ないぜ。 最近、色々と物騒だからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Miss, it's dangerous to walk alone in this city. Things have been very troubled lately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 情報屋ヨッツア様は、 天変地異が起ころうと営業中さ！ 情報を聞いてくかい？
Entry.EnglishText: I deal information even during natural disasters! What would you like to know?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> どの情報にしますか？ お得な無料情報 レアな有料情報 高価な重要機密 やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>What information would you like? Valuable Free Information Rare Paid Information Expensive Highly-Confidential Information No Thanks

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックのヤツ、ついに メセチナ洞窟の石碑の解読を 終わらせたらしいぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like Hack has finished deciphering the steles in the Mesechina Caverns.

Entry.JapaneseText: 古代カレギア語なんて、 オイラにはちんぷんかんぷんさ。 大したもんだ、まったく。
Entry.EnglishText: Ancient Callegean is gibberish to me, so that's a pretty big deal.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックのヤツ、こりもせずに 時々、メセチナ洞窟に行ってる みたいなんだよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Hack has been going to the Mesechina Caverns despite that time he nearly got killed.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょくちょくのぞいてやってよ。 バイラスの事もあるし、 調査が進んでるかもよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You should check in on him often. There's the whole thing with the Biruses, not to mention his investigation is ongoing.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式が決まってすぐの頃、 バルカの宿代は、のきなみ 三倍以上になってたらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Soon after the date the Inauguration Ceremony was to be held on was decided upon, the rates for a room in Balka more than tripled.

Entry.JapaneseText: それが、港が封鎖になっちまって、 思ったより予約も入らなくて、 いつもの値段に戻したんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: But vacancies weren't being filled as expected because the ports were shut down, so the prices went back to normal.

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式が中止になって、 宿屋は大損したと思うだろ？ ところがどっこい、逆に大もうけ。
Entry.EnglishText: You'd think that the inn proprietors would have lost money after the Ceremony was cancelled, but they actually made a nice profit.

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式が延期になったと聞いた客は 二、三日もすれば儀式が行われると 思って、泊まり続けたってワケさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Because when the guests heard that the Ceremony had been postponed, they thought it might take place after two, maybe three days.

Entry.JapaneseText: マフマフは、首周りの毛で 感情を表現するんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Muffmuffs use the fur on their necks to express their emotions.

Entry.JapaneseText: 怒ると、爆発でもしたみたいに 毛が逆立つんだ。 まるで、ネコのしっぽだな。
Entry.EnglishText: When angered, their hair will stand on end in the shape of an explosion. Sort of like a cat's tail.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他においらが知ってるだけでも、 ハート型や星型があるよ。 知ってたかい？
Entry.EnglishText: The other shapes I know about are a heart shape or a star. Did you know about those?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>が頭に着けてる 金色のアレ、セレーナさんが プレゼントしたらしいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The gold headpiece that <Tytree> likes to wear was a gift from his sister.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、<Tytree>が悪い事をして セレーナさんがおまじないを唱えると 頭をギュッと締め付けるんだってさ。 ちょっとウソっぽいよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever <Tytree> does something bad, Selena will chant a magic spell and then it'll tighten around his head. Sounds a bit outlandish, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の旦那だけどさ、 意外や意外、裁ほうが得意だって <Blue>王の盾<White>の兵士が言ってたぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is about <Eugene>, but according to a soldier in the Royal Shield, he makes a surprisingly great judge.

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ギルってバイラスを水中で 見る事ができたら恋人ができる」 ……って話がちまたで流行ってるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a story making the rounds that, "If you can see a Birus called a Gill while you're in the water, you will find love..."

Entry.JapaneseText: ギルを求めて、さびしいダイバー達が 今日も海に飛び込んでるだろうね。
Entry.EnglishText: Even today, you have a lot of lonely divers jumping into the ocean in search of them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>兵士の持ってる棒には ギルってバイラスが１２匹まで 刺せるらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The staffs wielded by the soldiers in the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> can skewer up to twelve of those Gill Biruses.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスを使わずに、一撃で １２匹を刺した者には、サレから 金一封が出るんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: If someone can skewer twelve of them in one thrust without using their Force, Saleh will reward them with Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女医のキュリア先生っているだろ？ あんな人に叱ってもらえたら 最高だよなぁー！
Entry.EnglishText: Are you aware of Dr. Curia? Getting chastised by a woman like her is great!

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんだよ…… コレだって立派な情報だぜ!! おいらの個人情報ってヤツさ……
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What... It's some great info! It's my own private information, after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>が頭に着けてる 金色のアレ、セレーナさんが プレゼントしたらしいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The gold headpiece that <Tytree> likes to wear was a gift from his sister.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、<Tytree>が悪い事をして セレーナさんがおまじないを唱えると 頭をギュッと締め付けるんだってさ。 ちょっとウソっぽいよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever <Tytree> does something bad, Selena will chant a magic spell and then it'll tighten around his head. Sounds a bit outlandish, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>が頭に着けてる 金色のアレ、セレーナさんが プレゼントしたらしいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The gold headpiece that <Tytree> likes to wear was a gift from his sister.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、<Tytree>が悪い事をして セレーナさんがおまじないを唱えると 頭をギュッと締め付けるんだってさ。 ちょっとウソっぽいよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever <Tytree> does something bad, Selena will chant a magic spell and then it'll tighten around his head. Sounds a bit outlandish, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>の着ている服は…… 実は……<Eugene>の旦那の おさがりなんだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: The clothes that <Mao> wears are hand-me-downs from <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人が初めて会った時の服は ボロくなっちまったんだけど、 よく似た服が、旦那の子供の頃の 荷物の中にあったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>'s clothes when they first met were tattered, but <Eugene> found some clothes that fit him in his childhood belongings.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれを旦那が着てたと思うと ちょっとゆかいだね！
Entry.EnglishText: It's a little amusing to think <Eugene> used to wear that!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>の夜は 月蝕だったんだけどね、 海の向こうのラジルダでは……
Entry.EnglishText: The night of the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White> features a lunar eclipse, but across the sea in Razilda...

Entry.JapaneseText: 「はだか祭り」ってのがあったらしいよ。 五十年に一度の奇祭なんだけどさ、 ラジルダの人以外は参加できないんだ。 謎の祭りだけに……見てみたいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...They have a "Nude Festival." It occurs once every fifty years and only those from Razilda can participate. What a strange festival... I want to go see it.
Entry.Notes: Yotza is a degenerate I guess

Entry.JapaneseText: 女医のキュリア先生っているだろ？ あんな人に叱ってもらえたら 最高だよなぁー！
Entry.EnglishText: Are you aware of Dr. Curia? Getting chastised by a woman like her is great!

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんだよ…… コレだって立派な情報だぜ!! おいらの個人情報ってヤツさ……
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What... It's some great info! It's my own private information, after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: 笑い上戸にバクショウダケを 食べさせると、逆におとなしくなる らしいぜ!? まゆつば情報だけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: If you feed a happy drunk some Funny Fungus, it appears they sober up?! I think that might be a load of crock, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自称・伝説の海賊の子孫、 マウロってヤツのモットーは、 「もうかりたい」だってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: The motto of Mauro, the self- proclaimed descendant of the legendary pirate, is: "I want to make money."

Entry.JapaneseText: とことん受け身っていうか、 やる気がないっていうか…… 本当に海賊の子孫なのかね？
Entry.EnglishText: It sounds rather passive and unmotivated... Is that guy really the descendant of a pirate?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールの役場に居る、 「自由！ 自由！」ってうるさい 眼鏡の女の人の名前は、 「カトリーヌ」だってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: The woman with glasses in the town hall in Minal who's always yapping about "Freedom! Freedom!" is named Catherine.

Entry.JapaneseText: 似合ってるんだか、 似合ってないんだか、 よくわからないよな。
Entry.EnglishText: As to whether that name fits her or not, I am undecided.

Entry.JapaneseText: 情報ってのは、質と数に加えて 「新鮮さ」が大事なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: In addition to the quality and quantity of information, its "freshness" is also important.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょくちょく新情報を 仕入れてるから、コマメに 情報を聞きに来てくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm always stocking up on intel, so stop by frequently if you have something you want to know!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一回の情報につき １０００ガルドなんだけど どうする？
Entry.EnglishText: One piece of info is worth 1000 Gald. Whaddaya say?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 払いますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Pay up? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないなぁ。 悪いけど、お金を貯めて また来てくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, you don't have enough cash. Come back when you've saved some up.

Entry.JapaneseText: へへっ、毎度！ ここだけの話だけどね……
Entry.EnglishText: Hehe, my pleasure! Now, just between you and me...

Entry.JapaneseText: あのジルバって女は、 王家の傍流の出らしいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva appears to have royal blood.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、その血筋だって事は、 王城の誰ひとりとして、 知らなかったらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: However, no one in the castle seems to be aware of her royal lineage.

Entry.JapaneseText: ディスカバリーをコンプリートしたいなら 船でしか行けない場所にも 行かなきゃダメだぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you want to find every Discovery, you'll have to go places that can only be reached by ship!

Entry.JapaneseText: いっその事、空でも飛ぶとかな！ ……なーんてね。
Entry.EnglishText: Or better yet, you could fly there! ...Or something.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>の能力者、ドネルが 生きてるってウワサがあるぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Donel of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> is rumored to be alive!

Entry.JapaneseText: もしホントウだったら、 ドビックリするよなぁ！
Entry.EnglishText: It would really rock if that were true!
Entry.Notes: Lit. It'd be very shocking if that were true My man does the Donel do thing

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>パンチモンキー<White>って動物は どこか小さい島に住んでるって ウワサだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard a rumor that an animal called a <Yellow>Punch Monkey<White> lives on a tiny little island.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックがずっと解読に取り組んでた メセチナ洞窟の石碑だけどさ、 やっと最後まで解読できたらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like Hack has finally managed to decipher the stele in the Mesechina Caverns.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックが言うには、古代の人が 自分たちの解釈で書いたものだから、 それが事実とは限らないみたいだけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: But Hack says that just because the ancients wrote it, doesn't mean their interpretations are true.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊アイフリードの墓の 真北あたりの氷の平野を探すと、 <Cyan>黒き星<White>があるらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you search the ice fields just to the north of the pirate Aifread's grave, they say there's a <Cyan>Black Star<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>黒き星<White>って 何なのかねえ？
Entry.EnglishText: Now, just what is that <Cyan>Black Star<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、この世界には、 歩いても行けない、船でも行けない 未知の街があるってウワサだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard a rumor that there's an unknown city that can't be reached by land nor boat.

Entry.JapaneseText: 空でも飛べたら、 見つけられるのかもね！ 情報の宝庫だろうなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: If you were able to fly, you might be able to find it! It might be a treasure trove of information...

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト将軍に、 見合いの話があったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard a story of General Milhaust being arranged for marriage.

Entry.JapaneseText: お相手のヒューマは、 ものすごいべっぴんさんで、 お似合いだったそうだ。
Entry.EnglishText: His prospective partner was a beautiful Huma woman, and she seemed to be a good match for him.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、ミルハウストは断った。 理由はいまだに不明だが、 どうやら心に決めた相手が いるとかいないとか……
Entry.EnglishText: However, Milhaust turned her down. His reasons for doing so are unclear, but perhaps he has his sights set on someone else...

Entry.JapaneseText: 王城では有名な、 ドクター・バースの フルネームは……
Entry.EnglishText: The full name of the famous doctor who worked in the castle, Doctor Barrs, is...

Entry.JapaneseText: ケビン・バース。 ファーストネームがあるのに、 ドクター、ドクターって呼ばれてた。
Entry.EnglishText: Kevin Barrs. He has a first name, but everyone just kept calling him "Doctor."

Entry.JapaneseText: 肩書きがあだ名になった人の 典型的なパターンだな。
Entry.EnglishText: It's a rather common occurrence for someone's title to become their nickname.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、東大陸の北の先、 ネレグの塔の近くの小屋で 不思議な事が起こるらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems as though there's been something strange happening at the hostel by the Tower of Nereg on the eastern continent.

Entry.JapaneseText: 近くまで行ったら、 寄ってみるといいかもよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you're ever over there, it might be a good idea to check it out.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾・四星<White>のサレ…… あいつは、子供の頃から フォルスを持ってたらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: So Saleh of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>... It seems like he's had Force since he was a child.
Entry.Notes: Royal Shield Four Stars seems redundant to me

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>の前は ヒューマの能力者は、けっこう 珍しい存在だったよなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: A Huma having Force before the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White> was a very rare occurrence, indeed...

Entry.JapaneseText: でもって、子供の頃から、 ああいう性格だったらしいよ。 どうしようもないヤツだね。
Entry.EnglishText: But it seems like he also has a childish personality... I guess he was always a lost cause.

Entry.JapaneseText: 十数年前、謎の男がハーフを 探し回っていたらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: Twenty years ago, there was a mysterious man who was searching for Halfs.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフ狩りだっていう話と、 捨てられたハーフの子を 保護してるっていう話がある。
Entry.EnglishText: There are stories of how he hunted Halfs, and also stories of him protecting abandoned Half children.

Entry.JapaneseText: どっちにしても、ハーフの つらさがわかる話だよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Whatever the case may be, you can tell that being a Half is rather unforgiving.

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラードの蒼の聖殿から、 世にも不思議な龍が飛びたったのを 見たって人がいるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There are people out here who saw a strange dragon fly out of the Azure Sanctuary in Babilograd.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の人たちには、何も 見えなかったらしいけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: There are others who didn't see anything, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: おいらは、その青い龍が、 世の中に悪さしてると思うんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Personally, I think that blue dragon is up to no good.

Entry.JapaneseText: い、今……「ぼくじゃない！」って 声が聞こえたような…… おいら、疲れてるのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: D-Did I just hear a voice saying "No, I'm not!"...? I must be getting tired...

Entry.JapaneseText: よくわからない話なんだがね、 左スティックってのを回すと 詠唱速度ってのが速くなるらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't quite know what this means, but if you rotate the left stick, you can reduce casting times.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何の事かわかったら、 おいらにも教えてくれよな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you understand what that's all about, do tell me.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア軍の副将の名前は ランデルマ、っていうんだぜ。 知ってたかい？
Entry.EnglishText: The vice-general of the Callegean Army is named Randlema. Did you know that?
Entry.Notes: maybe from Randleman (ランデルマン)?

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエンの名物料理は 意外や意外、フルーツチーズなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The signature dish of Kyogen is, rather unexpectedly, Fruit Cheese.

Entry.JapaneseText: それも思いがけないものに 入ってるっていうんだ。 その先は……行ってのお楽しみだな。
Entry.EnglishText: It's also been placed somewhere unexpected... You'll have to look forward to finding it yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: クロダダク砂漠の辺りを旅する じいさんが、どうにもおいしい、 スペシャルなピザを持ってるらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: There seems to be an old man traveling through the Kurodadaku Desert who has a very delicious Special Pizza.

Entry.JapaneseText: その名もスペシャルピザ！ ……まんまな名前が タマにキズだけどね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's a Special Pizza, after all! ...Though, I guess the name is a bit too on-the-nose...

Entry.JapaneseText: ドクター・バースの使っていた 手術用のメスはナカコ鋼製だった。
Entry.EnglishText: The surgical scalpels that Doctor Barrs used were made out of Nakako steel.

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカの職人に わざわざ作らせた特注品で 一本２０００ガルドもしたそうだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: They were custom made by a craftsman in Petnadjanka and cost 2000 gald a pop.

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス港にいる女の人は エメラルドマニアなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a woman at the harbor in Belsas who is obsessed with Emeralds.

Entry.JapaneseText: エメラルドをあげると なかなかイイお返しを くれるらしいよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that if you give her one, she'll give you something great in return!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>パンチモンキー<White>って動物は どこか小さい島に住んでるって ウワサだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard a rumor that an animal called a <Yellow>Punch Monkey<White> lives on a tiny little island.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊アイフリードの墓の 真北あたりの氷の平野を探すと、 <Cyan>黒き星<White>があるらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you search the ice fields just to the north of the pirate Aifread's grave, they say there's a <Cyan>Black Star<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>黒き星<White>って 何なのかねえ？
Entry.EnglishText: Now, just what is that <Cyan>Black Star<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ女王は、ああ見えても、 ミルクと砂糖をたっぷりかけた イチゴミルクには目がないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Despite what it may seem, Queen Agarte is actually a sucker for strawberry milk that's full of sugar.
Entry.Notes: Strawberry milk that is full of milk and sugar

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王に会う時の手土産は イチゴで決まりだな！
Entry.EnglishText: If you ever meet the Queen, make sure you take some strawberries with you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>のドネルが ヘンな言葉遣いをするのは、 生い立ちに影響しているらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: One of the phrases that Donel of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> likes to say seems to be rooted in his upbringing.
Entry.Notes: I had to localize this gomen He's saying Donel appending Do (an intensifier) to everything is a result of his childhood.

Entry.JapaneseText: 赤ん坊の頃、自分の名前を うまく言えずに「ド……」と 言うたびに親が喜んだ。
Entry.EnglishText: When he was a baby, his parents were delighted when the only part of his name he was able to say was "Do"...

Entry.JapaneseText: それで、味をしめたドネルは、 何にでも「ド」をつけるように なったらしいぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: It appears as though that's why he got into the habit of saying "D'oh"...
Entry.Notes: After that, Donel took a liking to it and started adding "Do" to everything...

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラードでは、男女が 会話する事が禁じられているのは 知ってるよね？
Entry.EnglishText: You know how men and women are forbidden from talking to one another in Babilograd?

Entry.JapaneseText: 男女のコミュニケーションは 手紙を使うのが普通なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Over there, the main mode of communication between the sexes is by writing letters.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、手紙の上手な人が、 あの街ではモテるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: So those who are skilled at writing are rather popular in that town.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、あの街以外の人が ラブレターを読むと、こっちが 恥ずかしくなっちまうらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: But if someone who's not from there were to read those love letters, they'd probably get very embarrassed.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダのイゴルって男は、 <Blue>王の盾<White>がヒューマの娘たちを 集めていた時、抵抗して捕まった。
Entry.EnglishText: A man from Razilda, Igor, was arrested when the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> was gathering Huma girls.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの族長の息子として 街の娘を守ろうとしたっていうのは 表向きの話……
Entry.EnglishText: On the surface, it would seem like he was trying to protect the village girls because he's the son of the Huma chief...

Entry.JapaneseText: 本人は決して口にはしないが、 そのさらわれそうになった マヤって子に惚れてるらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: He won't admit to it, but it seems like he has feelings for the girl who was kidnapped, Maya.

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラードの登山洞の レバーは、どうにかすると 動くって話だぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that you can pull the levers in the Climber's Cavern.

Entry.JapaneseText: レバーを動かした時、何が起こるのか それは動かしてのお楽しみさ…… なんちゃって、知らないんだけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: And what you can look forward to after pulling the lever is... Actually, I don't know.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト将軍は、 王城での儀式の時、城の別室で 何か仕事をさせられていたらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently, Milhaust was made to do some work in a different area of the castle during the Ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかも、女王陛下の命令で。 儀式に呼ばれなかったって事さ。 王室では煙たがられてるのかもな。
Entry.EnglishText: It was the Queen's orders. Which means he wasn't invited to the ceremony. I guess the royal family doesn't like hanging out with him.

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカを囲うように山がそびえてるだろ？ その外側には発見物が三つあるらしいぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: You know the mountains that surround Balka? Allegedly, there's three things to be discovered on the other side of them.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、三つとも見つけるには <Red>観察力<White>が<Yellow>５２<White>はないとなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: But if you want to find them, you'll need to have an <Red>Observation Power<White> of <Yellow>52<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>の内部は、 けっこう大変らしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that there's been a lot of commotion in the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の旦那を支持する もとからの隊員たちと、 トーマたちのような新参者とが うまくいってないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The original members, who were supporters of <Eugene>, aren't getting along with new members, who are more like Tohma and his ilk.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウワサでは、何人もの隊員が トーマに処刑されたらしい……
Entry.EnglishText: Rumor has it that many of them have been executed by Tohma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスの宿屋で食材を買うと、 サービスしてくれる事があるんだ。 お得だろ？
Entry.EnglishText: I hear you get a freebie if you buy ingredients at the inn in Belsas. Quite a steal, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスへ行ったら食材。 忘れちゃいけないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't forget to get ingredients the next time you're in Belsas.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>漆黒トリオ<White>のギンナルは、 あれでも能力者なんだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ginnar of the <Blue>Dark Trio<White> is a Force user as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: やたらと遠くまで声が通る、 <Yellow>声のフォルス<White>ってのを 持ってるらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that he has the <Yellow>Force of Voice<White>, which lets his voice carry over great distances.

Entry.JapaneseText: 号令係としては、かなり いい仕事をするらしいよ。 ま、ウワサだけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently he's really good at giving commands. Well, that's just a rumor, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>漆黒トリオ<White>のドルンブも、 やっぱり能力者らしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Drombe of the <Blue>Dark Trio<White> seems to have been a Force user after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>力のフォルス<White>ってのが ドルンブの能力らしいんだけど、 ただの力持ちにしか見えないよな。
Entry.EnglishText: He seems to have the <Yellow>Force of Power<White>. He looks like your average strongman, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダには グミマニアの男がいるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a man in Razilda who's crazy about Gels.

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵士でもないのにグミを 欲しがるヘンなヤツなんだ。 ラジルダ行ったら話してみなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: He's a strange guy who really wants Gels even though he isn't a soldier. You should go talk to him if you're ever in Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: これは、ちょいと高いんだ…… ワケありでね……
Entry.EnglishText: This is kinda pricey, but there's a reason for that...

Entry.JapaneseText: ズバリ、５００００ガルド！ どうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, it's 50,000 Gald? Whaddaya say?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 払いますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Pay up? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪いけど、これだけは タダとはいかないんだ。 がんばって、お金を貯めてくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, but I can't give this one out for free. Have fun saving money!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Annie>ちゃん…… この「重要機密」に覚えはあるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Annie... Do you remember this Highly-Confidential Information?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これ……わたしの日記！ どこかでなくしたと思ったのに、 どうしてここに……
Entry.EnglishText: ...That's... My diary! I thought I lost it somewhere, so how did you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……盗品だろうが落とし物だろうが、 どんな物でも流れている 裏のマーケットがあるのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Whether it's a lost or stolen article, there's a black market somewhere willing to sell it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 知り合いの名前が書いてあったんで、 ピンときたこのヨッツア様が 競り落としたってワケさ！
Entry.EnglishText: I noticed that it had the name of an acquaintance of mine on it, so I just had to win it in the auction!

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、落とし物を返すよ。 ５００００ガルドのお礼も もらった事だしね。
Entry.EnglishText: Here, I'll give it back to you, because you gave me a 50,000 Gald reward for finding it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> <Cyan><Annie>の日記<White> その１～５ その６～10 その11～15 その16～20 その21～25 次へ やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><Cyan><Annie>'s Diary<White> Entries 1~5 Entries 6~10 Entries 11~15 Entries 16~20 Entries 21~25 Next Quit

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「明日は晴れ」<White> 明日は、久しぶりにお父さんの お休みの日…… お食事をして、お買い物をして、 家に帰ったら、お父さんの肩を もんであげようかな…… このところ、とてもお疲れの 様子だったから…… お父さん、ずっと元気でいてね。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Tomorrow will be Sunny -<White> Tomorrow will be Father's first day off in a long time... I'll do some cooking, go shopping, and when I get home, I think I'll give my father a shoulder rub... Because he seems so exhausted these days... Father, please take care of yourself...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「お父さん」<White> お父さん、お父さん、お父さん お父さん、お父さん、お父さん お父さんお父さんお父さん…… お父さん……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Father -<White> Father, Father, Father Father, Father, Father FatherFatherFather... Father...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「雨の日……」<White> お父さんが殺された…… 親友だったあの人に…… 何度も名前を聞かされた、 ガジュマのあの名前…… 忘れない、絶対に許さない。 お父さんの仇を取るまで わたしはもう泣かない……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- A Rainy Day... -<White> My father was murdered... By someone he considered a trusted friend... Again and again I'm being told that name, that Gajuma's name... I won't forget this, I won't forgive this. I won't cry any more tears until I get revenge for what happened to my father...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「王の盾との契約」<White> 今日、<Blue>王の盾<White>と契約をした。 入隊する代わりに、お父さんを 殺したあの人の居場所を教えて もらった…… これからミナール平原へ向かう。 罠を張り、あの人を殺すため。 ……人を殺すなんて、考えても みなかった……どうかしてる。 でも……悪いのはあの人……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- A Contract with the Royal Shield -<White> Today I made a contract with the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. In exchange for enlisting into their ranks, they told me the whereabouts of my father's killer... Now I am headed toward the Minal Plains. I am going to set a trap for him so that I can kill him. ...I've never considered killing someone before... What's wrong with me...? But...the one in the wrong is him...
Entry.Notes: Seems like its too long so I shortened it. Need to double check how far we can go with this Gator/Dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ミナール」<White> ミナールで、殺し屋と合流した。 とある人が、わたしのために 雇ってくれた殺しのプロ…… 殺し屋の人たちは、楽しそうに 標的の事を聞いて来た。 笑いながら殺し方を考えていた。 人の命を奪う事を、こんなにも 軽く考えられるなんて…… きっとあのガジュマも……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Minal -<White> After arriving in Minal, I met up with the assassins. A certain someone hired these professional killers for me... They asked me gleefully about our target and laughed as they thought up ways to kill him. To think so lightly about taking someone's life... Surely that Gajuma thought the same...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「お父さんの夢」<White> 夜、夢を見た。 お父さんが笑ってた。 お父さんが顔をしかめてた。 お父さんが泣いてた…… どうしてなのと尋ねても、 返事はなかった。 わたしも泣いちゃった……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- A Dream of My Father -<White> Last night, I saw a dream. Father was laughing. Father was frowning. Father was crying. When I asked him why, I didn't get an answer. I cried too.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「わからない」<White> 色々あった……あの人と戦って、 負けて、助けられて…… ミーシャを傷つけて、キュリア 先生に叱られて……そして…… あの人と一緒に行く事になった。 わからない……あの人の心も、 自分の気持ちも、お父さんの言葉、 「命に色はない」の意味も…… もう、何もわからない……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- I Don't Know -<White> A lot of things happened... I fought against <Italic>him</Italic>, I lost, and then they helped me out... I hurt Mischa, got reprimanded by Dr. Curia... And... I ended up traveling with him. I don't know...what he's thinking, how I'm feeling, what my father meant when he said "Life knows no color"... I can't make sense of anything anymore...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「迷いの森の事」<White> 前に、お父さんとこの森に来た。 お父さんが森に棲むバイラスの 話をして……恐かった。 わたしが途中でケガをした時、 お父さんが薬草を見つけて、 傷口に当ててくれた…… 薬草でお父さんを助けられたら よかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Forest Labyrinth -<White> My father and I have visited this forest in the past. When Father told me about the Biruses that lurked in the forest, I got scared. I suffered an injury during our trip, and Father found some medicinal herbs for me and applied them to my wound... If only I could have saved my father with those herbs...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「<Tytree>さんの事」<White> <Tytree>さんって…… わたし、ちょっと苦手かも。 <Veigue>さんもちょっと怖い けど……どっちかって言ったら <Veigue>さんのほうがいいな。 セレーナさんはとてもキレイで すてきな人だった。 あんな大人になれるといいな。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- <Tytree> -<White> So this <Tytree>... He's not really my cup of tea. Sure, <Veigue> is kinda scary...but if you asked me who I preferred, I would have to say <Veigue>. Ms. Selena was very pretty and seemed like a wonderful person. I'd like to be like that when I grow up.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「毒キノコ事件」<White> <speed:0> <Tytree>さんの大失敗で みんな毒キノコを食べて中毒に なってしまった…… あの人すら知ってた毒キノコを 知らなかったわたしも最低…… もっと勉強しなくちゃ…… <Tytree>さんって、案外、 男らしいんだな、って思った。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Poison Mushroom Incident -<White> Because of <Tytree>'s huge blunder, we all ate poisonous mushrooms and couldn't stop laughing... Even <Italic>that person</Italic> knew about the poisonous mushrooms, that I didn't is just unacceptable... I need to study more... That <Tytree>, I guess he's manlier than I thought he would be.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「河下り」<White> 河下りはちょっと怖かったけど 歩きの何倍もの速さで サニイタウンに着いた。 少しでも<Blue>王の盾<White>に追いつく事が できればいいと思う。 口には出さないけれど、 <Veigue>さんも<Tytree>さんも ふと見せる顔は、とても険しい。 わたしが<Blue>王の盾<White>の目的を 知ってたらよかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Down the River -<White> Going down the river was a little scary, but we reached Sunnytown several times faster than if we were to go by foot. Anything we can do to catch up to the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> is fine by me. <Veigue> and <Tytree> haven't said anything, but their expressions have suddenly become very grim. If only I knew what the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>'s goal was...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「もうひとつの種族」<White> ハーフの人に、初めて会った。 ヒューマとガジュマが愛し合う なんて……想像もできない。 ……子供が生まれるって事は、 生き物として、ヒューマと ガジュマは同じだって事…… <Tytree>さんは、種族なんて 関係ないって言ったけど…… わたしはそうは思えない。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Yet Another Race -<White> I met a Half for the first time. That a Huma and a Gajuma can love one another... I can't even imagine. ...That children can be born between them; that as living beings, Huma and Gajuma are the same... <Tytree> says that such things have no relation to one's race... But I don't agree.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「<Hilda>さんの事」<White> またハーフに出会った。 四星のミリッツァ…… 感情を失ったような暗い瞳が 忘れられない。 そして、<Hilda>さんが 一緒に行く事になった。 ハーフの人と、どう話したら いいのかわからないけど…… 女の人が一緒なのは心強い。 仲良くなれるかな……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- <Hilda> - <White> I met another Half. It was Militsa of the Four Stars... I won't forget those dark eyes that look as though they've lost all emotion. Also, <Hilda> started traveling with us. I have no idea what would be good to talk about with someone who's a Half... But traveling with another girl is comforting. I wonder if we'll get along...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「トモダチ」<White> スージーさんから、お城での 不思議な話を聞いた。 何が起きたのかわからないけど、 ただ、ひとつだけ感じたのは、 女王様は、友だちが欲しくて あんな事をしてるんじゃないか、 ……って事。 ふと、<Hilda>さんの事が思い 浮かんだけど、何も言えなかった。 それに、わたしの友だちって…… 誰なんだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- "Friends" -<White> We heard about some strange happenings at the castle from Susie. I don't really understand what had happened, but one thing I felt for sure was that if the Queen was looking for friends, she wouldn't do such a thing... Or something like that. <Hilda> came to mind, but I didn't say anything. Besides, when it comes to having friends... Who do I even have?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「デスガロ熱」<White> 今日は色々な人に助けられた…… フランツさん、<Tytree>さん、 そして、あの人…… <Hilda>さんに言われた。 もし、わたしが助からなかったら、 あの人は村人を殺してただろうって。 そんなに後悔してるのなら、 どうして殺したの……？ ちがう……自分がイヤになる……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Deathgaro Fever -<White> Today I was helped by a lot of different people... Mr. Frantz, <Tytree>, and also by <Italic>him</Italic>... <Hilda> told me all about it. I wonder, if he wasn’t able to save me, would he have killed all of those villagers? If he regrets it so much, then why did he kill my father... No... I'm not happy with myself...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「漆黒トリオ」<White> 登山洞で<Blue>漆黒の爪<White>って人たちに あった……<Blue>王の盾<White>の兵士だって 言ってたけど……信じられない。 なぜか、<Tytree>さんと<Mao>を 加えた五人の漆黒軍団を想像した。 全然、違和感がなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Dark Trio -<White> In the Climber's Cavern we met a group of people called the <Blue>Dark Claws<White>... They said that they were soldiers of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>, but I don't believe them. For some reason, I imagined <Tytree> and <Mao> joining them so that the five of them could form the Dark Corps. It's not like they wouldn't fit in.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ごめんなさい……」<White> とうとう<Blue>王の盾<White>に追いついた。 セレーナさんは助けられたけど、 クレアさんは、もういなかった。 わたしのせいだ…… わたしが病気にならなければ…… <Veigue>さん……ごめんなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- I'm Sorry... -<White> We finally caught up to the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. We managed to save Ms. Selena, but Claire wasn't there anymore by the time we arrived. It's all my fault... If only I hadn't gotten sick... I'm so sorry, <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「男の人って……」<White> バルカへ行く船で思った。 どこか、ミルハウストさんと <Veigue>さんは似てる…… 理由はわからないけど。 それから、<Tytree>さんが甲板で 泣いてた……やっぱり嬉しいのかな って思ったら、ちがった…… <Veigue>さんの事を考えると 喜べないし、つらくなるんだって <Mao>に話してた…… 男の人ってとても不思議……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Men... -<White> I was thinking on the boat to Balka. Somehow, Milhaust and <Veigue> are a lot alike... I'm not sure why though... And then, <Tytree> was crying on the deck of the ship... I thought for sure he would be in good spirits, but I was wrong... I overheard him telling <Mao> that when he thinks about <Veigue>, he can't be happy, he just feels miserable... Men sure are strange...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ついにバルカへ」<White> とうとうバルカに到着した。 以前とは比べ物にならないくらい 街が緊迫した雰囲気…… みんなとても厳しい顔をしてる。 ここに来た目的は色々だけど、 わたしはクレアさんを助けるため 全力を尽くしたいと思う……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Onward to Balka -<White> We've finally arrived in Balka. Compared to before, the city's atmosphere is incomparably tense. Everyone has a harsh expression on their face... We all have our various reasons for coming here, but I think I want to do everything in my power to help save Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「能力者収容所……」<White> お城でアガーテ様にお会いして うまくいくかと思ったのに…… 収容所に入れられるハメになった。 でも……漆黒トリオさんたちが 助けに来てくれて、わたしたちは 収容所を出る事ができた。 漆黒さんたちは敵だけど、決して 悪い人じゃない…… ちょっぴり好きになった。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- A Prison for Force Users... -<White> We met with Queen Agarte at the castle and I thought things were going well, but... We wound up thrown into prison. However, the Dark Trio came to our aid and we were able to break out. They might be our enemies, but I don't think they're bad people... Maybe I'm even starting to like them a little.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「儀式、そして……」<White> 儀式……信じられない事ばかり…… 女王様はヒューマの身体を欲しがって いた……そして、消えてしまった…… ミルハウストさんも、あの人も 泣いてた……なんだかとてもつらい。 唯一の救いは、<Veigue>さんが、 ついにクレアさんを救い出した事。 よかったですね、<Veigue>さん。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Ceremony... And also... -<White> The ceremony... So much of it was unbelievable... That the Queen desired the body of a Huma...and then she vanished... Milhaust and <Italic>that person</Italic> started crying... I felt upset as well for some reason... The only good thing was that <Veigue> was finally able to rescue Claire... I'm so happy for you, <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「解散」<White> <Veigue>さんたちはスールズへ 戻る事になった。 あの人がクレアさんを背負う。 父親が娘を背負うように…… 大きくて、哀しそうな背中。 わたしと<Hilda>さんは港まで 一緒に行って、見送った。 <Hilda>さんは、聖獣の事を 調べると言って去って行った。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Going Our Separate Ways - <White> <Veigue> and the others started to travel back to Sulz. <Italic>That person</Italic> was carrying Claire on his back. Like how a father would carry his daughter... On his large, sorrowful back. <Hilda> and I walked together until the harbor so that I could see her off. Saying that she was going to research the Sacred Beasts, we parted ways.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0> もうこの六人で旅をする事は ないと思ったら、なんだか複雑な 気分だった……そして…… わたしの復讐はまだ終わってない。 でも、ついて行かなかったのは、 あの人と離れて、色々と考えて みたかったから。 <Mao>たちが戻って来たら、 話をしなきゃいけない…… わたしにはまだ何も見えてない。
Entry.EnglishText: Now that the six of us aren't traveling together anymore, I have some mixed feelings... Also... My quest for revenge still isn't over. However, I didn't go with them, and he and I have been apart, because there's been a lot of things that I wanted to think about. When he and <Mao> return, I guess I'll have no choice but to talk to them... I still haven't gotten any closer to the truth.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ひとりぼっち」<White> ひとりでバルカの街を歩いた。 儀式が中止になった事でもちきり。 家に帰ってみた…… お父さんが「おかえり」って言って 出て来てくれるような気がして、 「ただいま」って言ってみたけど…… わたしは、またひとりぼっちに なっちゃった……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- All By Myself -<White> I walked around the streets of Balka all by my lonesome. Everyone was talking about how the Ceremony had been called off. Then I returned home... Thinking that Father was going to say "Welcome back," I said "I'm home," but... It looks like I'm the only one here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「メセチナ洞窟へ」<White> <Mao>とあの人が家を訪ねて来た。 そして、二人と一緒に メセチナ洞窟に行く事になった。 ゲオルギアスと関わりのある 遺跡がメセチナ洞窟にあると、 ハックさんから聞いたみたい。 あの人のそばにいるのはつらい。 でも、<Mao>がどうしても、 って言うから、だから……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- To the Mesechina Caverns -<White> <Mao> and You-Know-Who stopped by my house. And now, I'm headed together with them to the Mesechina Caverns. They had heard from Hack that there were some historic ruins in the Cavern which were connected to Geyorkias. Being in <Italic>that person's</Italic> presence is stressful for me. But <Mao> insisted that I come with, so...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「異変」<White> 洞窟で調査を始めたとたん、 あの人の具合が悪くなった…… 戦いの間でさえ感じた事のない、 強い殺気が、わたしに向けられて、 身動きできなくなった……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Incident -<White> When we started doing our research in the cavern, <Italic>that person</Italic> started feeling unwell. Even when we had fought against each other, I had never felt such a strong thirst for blood directed toward me... I felt myself unable to move...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0> あの人は洞窟の奥にこもって <Veigue>さんや<Tytree>さんを 呼んでくれって言い始めた…… <Mao>が泣きそうな顔で言うから、 わたしは<Veigue>さんたちを 呼びに行く事にした…… <Mao>のために…… <Mao>の……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>He then holed himself up in the depths of the cavern and asked that we retrieve <Veigue> and <Tytree> for him... Since <Mao> looked as though he was about to cry when he asked me, I decided to go and get them. I'm only doing this for <Mao>'s sake... For <Mao>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> <Cyan><Annie>の日記<White> その26～30 その31～35 その36～40 その41～45 その46～50 前へ やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><Cyan><Annie>'s Diary<White> Entries 26~30 Entries 31~35 Entries 36~40 Entries 41~45 Entries 46~50 Next Quit

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「スールズへ」<White> 迷ったけど、<Veigue>さんを 呼びに行く事にした…… 行く途中の船でガジュマたちに すごくイヤな目で見られたり、 意地悪な事をされた…… やっぱり、ガジュマはイヤ……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- To Sulz -<White> I was a bit hesitant, but I finally set off to go and get <Veigue>... While I was on the boat, the Gajuma passengers kept watching me with a nasty look in their eyes, and then they started causing a scene... Gajuma sure are awful...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「<Veigue>さん」<White> やっとスールズに着いたと思ったら いきなり事件があった…… <Veigue>さんは、怒るよりも、 とても哀しそうな顔をしていた…… それでも、<Veigue>さんは頼もしいな。 会ったとたん安心して、ホントは ちょっと泣きそうになっちゃった。 わたしって、子供っぽい……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- <Veigue> -<White> Just as I had arrived in Sulz, there was suddenly another incident... <Veigue>, instead of being angry, had a rather melancholy look on his face... Nevertheless, <Veigue> is dependable. I felt relieved right after I met up with him, and honestly, I felt as though I might cry a little. I'm acting like such a child...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ケケット街道の夜」<White> <Veigue>さんと二人で行動する なんて、とても緊張する…… 前は怖い人だと思ってたけど、 今はよくわからないけど緊張する。 それに、<Veigue>さんに言われた事を 考えてたら、眠れなくなった…… こっそり<Veigue>さんの寝顔を見た。 とてもやさしそうだった。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- A Night at Keketto Hostel -<White> Traveling together with just Veigue is making me very nervous. I used to think that he was kind of scary, but now I don't understand why I'm so anxious. Also, because I couldn't stop thinking about what <Veigue> had said to me, I had trouble sleeping. So I snuck a peak at Veigue's face while he slept. He looked very endearing.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「クレアさんの事」<White> 突然、クレアさんがやって来た。 女の人が一緒にいてくれると、 やっぱり安心する…… <Hilda>さんはどうしてるのかな。 それにしても、クレアさんの様子が なんだかおかしい気がする……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Claire -<White> Claire showed up unexpectedly. I feel much better traveling with another girl... I wonder what Hilda's up to. But anyway, something about Claire seems a little off...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「<Tytree>さんって……」<White> やっとペトナジャンカに着いた。 相変わらず<Tytree>さんはうるさい。 でも、わたしたちの話を聞いて 迷わず、一緒に行くって言った時、 すごく頼もしくて、カッコよかった。 <Tytree>さんの中には、 大切なものの順番があるんだろうな。 <Tytree>さんは大人だと思う……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- That Tytree... -<White> We finally made it to Petnadjanka. <Tytree>'s as boisterous as ever... But when he heard what we had to tell him and he said without hesitation that he would come with us, his unfailing dependability made him look really cool. I guess that <Tytree> knows deep down how to prioritize the things that are important to him. I think he's rather mature...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「バルカに向かう船の中で」<White> 海を見ながら、<Mao>の事を考えた。 どうして、あの人のためにあんなにも 必死になれるの？ <Mao>は以前、あの人の事を 「お父さんみたいなモノ」って言ってた。 でも、わたしにとってあの人は…… 「お父さん」をうばった仇…… 今日はもう考えるのはやめて、波の音を 聞きながら眠ろうと思う。 ……おやすみなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- On the Ship Headed Toward Balka -<White> As I looked out at the ocean, I thought about <Mao>. Why is <Mao> so desperate to help <Italic>that person</Italic>? He told me before that "He's like a father to me." But to me... That's the man who robbed me of my father. I'm going to stop thinking about it for today, the sound of the waves is lulling me to sleep. ...Good night...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「あの人の事」<White> ガジュマで、凶暴で、恐ろしくて、 お父さんを殺した人なのに…… わたしに自分を殺させるために、 <Veigue>さんたちを呼びに 行かせたなんて……信じられない！ あの人がわからない…… どうして、あなたなの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- About a Certain Someone -<White> That brutal, terrible Gajuma that murdered my father... ...Had me call <Veigue> and <Tytree> for him in the hopes that they would kill him... I can't believe it! I don't understand him at all... Why is he doing this...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ラジルダ」<White> ラジルダはすごくイヤな街だった。 ガジュマはヒューマを嫌ってて すごく感じが悪かったし…… それに、ヒューマなのにイーガって 人もすごくイヤだった…… 息子のイゴルさんはイイ人なのに。 でも、何がイヤだったんだろ…… わたしも同じガジュマ嫌いなのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Razilda -<White> Razilda was a terrible town. The Gajuma there seem to really hate Huma and I don't like it... And even though he's a Huma, that Iger is awful too. His son Igor is a nice man, however. I don't understand why I disliked Iger so much... Considering that I hate Gajuma as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「あの人との戦い……」<White> 洞窟で、あの人と戦った…… あの人と戦うのは、これで二度目。 でも、前の時とは何かが違った…… 本当にわたしたちを殺そうとしてた。 思念というもののせいで……？ とにかく、わたしたちはまた一緒に 旅をする事になった……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Fighting Against Him... -<White> When we got back to the cavern, we had to fight against <Italic>him</Italic>... This is the second time I've fought <Italic>him</Italic>... But this time, something was different... It felt like he really wanted to kill us. Is this all because of the Will? Anyway, it looks like we're going on another journey together...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「闇の力と聖獣」<White> 闇の力……聖獣……思念の浄化…… 色々な事がわかったけど…… わからない事もますます増えた。 遺跡を出た後の<Tytree>さんの顔、 前よりもたくましい感じがした……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Power of Shade and the Sacred Beasts -<White> The Power of Shade... The Sacred Beasts... Purifying the Will... I understood most of it, but... This just raises a whole lot of questions. After we left the ruins, when I looked at <Tytree>'s face, he seemed more resolute...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「<Mao>の記憶」<White> <Tytree>さんの次に、聖獣に 選ばれたのは<Mao>だった。 記憶が戻ったみたいだったけど 何も教えてくれなかった。 ふと見た横顔がさびしそうだった。 <Mao>にやさしくしてあげよう。 つらい記憶なら、自分で言うまで 聞かないほうがいいと思うけど、 ホントの名前だけ気になるな。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- <Mao>’s Memories -<White> After <Tytree>, the next one chosen by the Sacred Beasts was <Mao>. It seemed like he got his memories back, but he wouldn't tell us about them. When I took a quick glance at his profile, he seemed a little lonely. I think I'll try cheering him up. If his memories are painful, unless he wants to tell me about them, I won't ask. But I'm curious as to what his real name is...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ミルハウストさん」<White> ラジルダにミルハウストさんが来た。 目が……とても怖かった。 誰もよせつけない冷たさ、 大切なものを失った悲しみ、 強い決意……つらそうだった。 やつれてた…… 鏡を見たら、同じ目がそこにあった。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Mr. Milhaust -<White> Mr. Milhaust came to Razilda. The look in his eyes was...frightening. With a coldness that kept everyone away, the agony of having lost someone important to him, and a strong resolve... It must be agonizing for him. He looked worn out... When look in the mirror, tired eyes look back at me too.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「漆黒さんとサレ」<White> キョグエンからネレグの塔に行った。 でも、それはサレの罠だった。 漆黒さんたちを操って……ヒド過ぎる。 サレは本当にひどい人だと思う。 戦いの後、漆黒さんたちが改心した。 腕力の強い人たちじゃないけど、 心の強い人たちなんだなと思った。 がんばってる人たちなんだなと思った。 とてもカッコイイと思った。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Dark Trio and Saleh -<White> From Kyogen we traveled all the way to the Tower of Nereg. But at the top was a trap set by Saleh. That Saleh would be able to manipulate the Dark Trio like that... How awful. Saleh is such a deplorable person. After we fought them, the Dark Trio came to their senses. While physically they're kind of wimpy, the three of them have their hearts in the right place. They're the type of people who never give up. I think they’re pretty cool.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「命の色……」<White> お父さん、ごめんなさい。 わたし、何もわかってなかった。 お父さんが言った言葉…… 少しだけど、やっとわかったよ。 だから……信じてみる…… あの人を……<Eugene>を…… 同じ色の命を持つあの人を…… お父さんが信じたあの人を……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Color of Life -<White> Father, I'm sorry. I didn't understand at all. Those words that you said... Little by little, I’m coming to understand them. So... I’m trying to believe in <Italic>him</Italic>... In Eugene... Someone who's life is the same color as mine... Someone who you believed in...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「お父さんの真実」<White> 聖獣に見せられた…… あの事件のすべてを。 <Eugene>が何も言わなかったのは お父さんの名誉を守るためだった。 悪いのはお父さんだった……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Truth about my Father -<White> At my trial the Sacred Beast showed me... The entirety of that night. Eugene had kept quiet about it because he was trying to protect my father's good name. All this time, my father was the one in the wrong...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0> <Eugene>……ごめんなさい…… あなたがいなかったら…… あなたが受け止めてくれなかったら、 わたしはどうなってたか わからない…… わたしに差し伸べてくれた手のひらも、 わたしを抱きしめてくれた胸も、 とても温かかった…… お父さんと同じだった…… ありがとう……<Eugene>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>... I'm so sorry... If you weren't there for me... I don't know what would have become of me. When you held out your hand for me, and when you hugged me close to your heart, I felt a pleasant warmth. Just as if I was being held by my father... Thank you, <Eugene>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「クレアさんとアガーテ様」<White> 二人が入れ替わってたなんて…… そんな事があるなんて…… 信じられない……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Claire and Queen Agarte -<White> That two people can exchange their souls... That something like that can happen... I can't believe it...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「シャオルーンの試練」<White> シャオルーンが<Veigue>さんを 指名して、試練が始まった。 あんなに取り乱した<Veigue>さんは 今までに見た事なかった…… 一体、何を見せられたんだろ…… 試練が終わったのに<Veigue>さんの 表情が冴えないのが気になる……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Shaorune's Trial -<White> It was time for <Veigue>'s trial with Shaorune to begin. I've never seen <Veigue> so upset before... What in the world was Shaorune showing him...? I'm a little worried because after the trial, <Veigue> had a scowl on his face...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「お母さん……」<White> 運命っていうのがあるのなら…… こんなひどい運命はないと思う。 やっと会えた二人なのに…… <Hilda>さんは、強がってたけど やっぱりお母さんに 会いたかったんだと思った……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Mother... -<White> If there is such a thing as fate... I don't think it would be as cruel as this. Just as they had been reunited... <Hilda> likes to put on a brave front, but I believe that she truly wanted to get to know her mother...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0> わたしのお母さんは小さい頃に 亡くなってしまったけど…… 「お母さん」って呼んだ時の 安心するような気持ちは、今でも はっきり覚えてる…… 時々、<Hilda>さんがうつむいて 涙を隠してるのを見たら、 わたしも泣いてしまった……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>My mother passed away when I was very small, but... I can still clearly remember the reassurance I felt when I called for my mother... Whenever I see Hilda lower her head so she can hide her tears, I start crying as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「幻の島……」<White> サニイタウンが聖獣の背中だった なんて、とってもびっくりした。 でも……もっと驚いたのは、 <Eugene>が今までずっと、 思念に耐えてた事。 その事を考えたら泣けてきた…… 最近、泣いてばかりいる。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Island of Illusion... -<White> I was very surprised to learn that Sunnytown was built on the back of one of the Sacred Beasts... But... On a more serious note, until now <Eugene> had remained under the shadow of the Will. Just thinking about it is making me cry... I've been crying a lot these days.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「浄化、そして……」<White> ようやく浄化が終わったのに、 もっと大変な事が起きてると、 シャオルーンが言うから、 わたしたちは旅を続ける事になった。 みんなと一緒にいられるのは うれしいけど、これから一体、 どうなっちゃうんだろ……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- The Purification, and also... -<White> Even though we had completed the Purification, since Shaorune said that there are more terrible events going on in the world, we are continuing on our journey. While I'm happy to be together with my friends, I have no idea what in the world is going to happen...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「気になる事……」<White> 世界を回って、争いを止める旅を してて、ちょっと気になった…… <Veigue>さんがクレアさんを ぜんぜん見ない…… めったに話をしないし、話をしても とてもぎこちない…… <Tytree>さんも気づいたみたい。 とても心配していた……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- A Cause for Concern... -<White> As we've been traveling around the world trying to quell all of the conflicts, there's something that I've found concerning... <Veigue> can barely even bring himself to look at Claire... He rarely even talks to her anymore, and when he does, it's painfully awkward. I think <Tytree> has noticed as well. I'm really worried...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「暴走……」<White> ついに、心配してた事が本当に なってしまった。 <Veigue>さんのフォルスが 暴走した……クレアさんの事で。 こうなる前に何とかしたかった。 暴走した<Veigue>さんは これまで戦った誰よりも強かった。 クレアさん、<Veigue>さん、 今、どこにいるんですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Berserk -<White> Finally, my fears came true. Veigue lost control over his Force...because of the situation with Claire. I wish I could have done something to prevent this. <Veigue> was stronger than anyone else I had ever fought against when he went berserk. Claire, <Veigue>, where are you right now...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「<Veigue>さんの涙」<White> <Veigue>さんと<Tytree>さんが 大ゲンカした…… あんなになるまで殴り合って…… <Veigue>さんの涙を初めて見た。 でも、あの後の<Veigue>さんの 顔は……とても穏やかだった。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Veigue's Tears -<White> <Veigue> and <Tytree> had a huge argument... It got to the point where they got into a fistfight... I saw <Veigue>'s tears for the first time. But after that, he looked at ease.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0> <Eugene>に聞いたら、 <Tytree>さんがああするのは わかってたって…… 男はそういうもんだって…… ケンカの後、<Tytree>さんを 治療した時、すごくうれしそうに 痛がってた。 なんだか悔しくって、いつもより しみる消毒を使っちゃった。
Entry.EnglishText: When I asked <Eugene>, he said that he understood why <Tytree> would do such a thing... I guess that's just how men are. After the fight, when I was tending to his wounds, <Tytree> seemed really happy to be in pain. I'm somewhat disappointed that I used up more of my disinfectant than I would have liked to.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「ピーチパイ」<White> スールズで、<Veigue>さんや クレアさんのご両親に会った。 すてきな人たちだった。 そして、みんなでポプラさんの ピーチパイを食べた。 色々な事が頭に浮かんだ…… ふと、気分が楽になった。 <Veigue>さんも立ち直ったみたい。 この旅が終わったら、 またここに来て、みんなで パーティーがしたいな……
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Peach Pie -<White> I met <Veigue> and <Claire>'s parents for the first time. They were lovely people. And also, we all ate some of Ms. Poplar's peach pies. A lot of things had been going through my head... But now I feel relieved. After our journey is over, I'd like to come back here with everyone and have another peach pie party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「わたしの決意」<White> ラジルダが崩壊して、なくなった。 この世界が破滅するかもしれない ほどの危機が迫ってる…… わたしたちはその危機に立ち向かう。 何ができるかわからないけど、 できる限りの事をしたいと思う。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- My Decision -<White> Razilda collapsed into the ocean and is no more. I guess the complete destruction of our world is at hand... But we will stand tall in the face of crisis. I'm not sure what I can do about it, but I want to try everything that I can.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0> 平和で静かな世界が戻ってきたら、 またこの日記を書きたい…… そのためにもがんばらなくっちゃ！ わたしには、まだまだ知りたい事や やりたい事がたくさんあるから…… お父さん、わたしを見守っていてね。 <italic:100><Annie>・バース
Entry.EnglishText: When the world has returned to peace and tranquility, I'd like to once again write in this diary... For that sake, I will do my best! There are still so many things that I want to learn, so many things that I want to do... Father, please watch over me. <italic:100>Annie Barrs

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 別のページを読みますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Read another page? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: おいらは、中身は見てないぜ！ ……って、実は最初の２ページくらいは 読んじまったけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I swear I didn't take a peek! ...Okay, maybe I did read the first two pages...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ヨッツアさん、この日記、 預かってもらえませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Yotza, could you hold onto my diary for me?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……えっ！ いいけど、どうしてだい？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Huh? I mean, sure, but why?

Entry.JapaneseText: この日記の中にいるのは、 過去のわたしです…… 今のわたしには、やらなくちゃ ならない事があるから……
Entry.EnglishText: What lies within this diary is the me of the past... The me who exists now still has things to do...

Entry.JapaneseText: 全てが終わったら、取りに来ます。 わたしの「過去」を…… だから……
Entry.EnglishText: When this is all over, I will come back for it. My "past," that is... So...

Entry.JapaneseText: よし、わかった。 もしも、読みたくなったら、 またここに来なよ。
Entry.EnglishText: All right, got it. If you'd like to read it, then come stop by.

Entry.JapaneseText: おっと！ 悪いね…… あんたじゃダメだ。 <Annie>ちゃん以外はね……
Entry.EnglishText: Whoops! Sorry, can't show this to you. You aren't <Annie>, after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何せ、「重要機密」だからな。 ……ってなわけで、お金は返すぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: After all, it is "Highly-Confidential Information"... So I'm gonna have to give your money back!

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、やめておくのかい？ また来てくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you're finished? Stop by some other time!

Entry.JapaneseText: はいよ、例の「重要機密」だね。
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, here's the "Highly-Confidential Information."

Entry.JapaneseText: おっと！ 悪いね…… あんたじゃダメだ。 <Annie>ちゃん以外はね……
Entry.EnglishText: Whoops! Sorry, can't show this to you. You aren't <Annie>, after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、やめておくのかい？ また来てくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you're finished? Stop by some other time!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> どの情報にしますか？ お得な無料情報 レアな有料情報 高価な重要機密 ヒマつぶし情報 やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>What information would you like? Valuable Free Information Rare Paid Information Expensive Highly-Confidential Information Dilly Dallying Dossier No Thanks

Entry.JapaneseText: こいつは、ある場所に捨てられていた 日記なんだけどね、 まあ、百聞は一見にしかずさ。 読んでみなって。
Entry.EnglishText: This is some diary I found thrown away somewhere. Well, seeing is believing, so why don't you take a look.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「おれの決意表明！」<White> 今日から書くぜ！ でも、今日は平凡な一日だったから、 本格的なのは明日からにしよう！
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- Here's What I’m Gonna Do! -<White> Starting today, I'm going to write a diary! But today was a pretty average day for me, so I'll start writing for real tomorrow!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「おそるべき計画！」<White> まあ、毎日、劇的な事があるわけじゃ ないからなぁ……よっしゃ、決めた！ 料理日記にしてみるか！ でも、今日は大したもん作ってないし 本格的なのは明日からにしよう！ 一年もすりゃあ、<Tytree>レシピ集が できちまうなぁ……こいつぁすげーぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- My Awesome Plan! -<White> Well, lately, there's nothing really spectacular going on so... I've made up my mind! I'm going to start writing a cooking diary! But today I didn't really make anything worth mentioning, so I'll start writing for real tomorrow! If I do this for a whole year, I'll have a nice collection of my trademark <Tytree> recipes... This is gonna be great!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「おれは男だ！」<White> おれは男だ！ もっとこうズバッといかねえとな！ 明日からは、男らしく、大胆かつ キレ味のある日記を書くぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- I'm a Man! -<White> I'm a man! So I'm not going to pull any punches! Starting tomorrow, I'm gonna write a manlier, no-nonsense diary!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「最終回」<White> 思い出は心に刻むもんだぜ！ さらば、日記の日々…… 完
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- This'll Be the Last Time -<White> Memories are best kept in one's heart! To my days of writing in a diary... Farewell... The End

Entry.JapaneseText: どうだい？ お金をもらうような 価値はないと思うけどさ、 ヒマつぶしぐらいにはなった？
Entry.EnglishText: Well? I didn't think is was worth asking money for, but it really helps you kill time, huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんで、おれの日記が、 「ヒマつぶし情報」で しかも、タダなんだよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you calling my diary the "Dilly Dallying Dossier" and why are you showing it to people for free?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ゼロか!! おれはゼロの男か!?
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think I'm some sort of zero, huh?! A ZERO?!

Entry.JapaneseText: タダでも高いです！ こんなひどい日記を読まされて、 お金をもらいたいくらいです！
Entry.EnglishText: Even free is too high of a price! You'd have to pay <Italic>me</Italic> money to make me read such an awful thing!

Entry.JapaneseText: し、仕方ないなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I guess I have no choice...

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、あんただけに特別、 消してあったページの内容も 読ませてあげるよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Since you're so special, I'll let you read the contents of a page that got erased...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><Cyan>「<Annie>って……」<White> 聖獣の試練を終えたら、 <Annie>の顔つきが変わった。 あいつが笑うと、あんなに カワイイなんてな…… 将来、イイ女になるよ、間違いなく。 ……うーむ…… ……誰かに見られるとヤバイんで このページは消す事にしよう！
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><Cyan>- About Annie... -<White> After her trial with the Sacred Beast, <Annie>'s expression has changed. When she smiles, she's pretty cute... She'll be a good woman when she grows up, no doubt about it. ...Yeah... ...If someone were to read that, things might get a little dicey, so I'm gonna erase this page!

Entry.JapaneseText: ど、どうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: W-Well?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まったく、日記って 性格が出るわね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, this diary certainly has personality.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナニコレー!? くぅだらなーい！
Entry.EnglishText: The heck was that?! What a waste of time!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……情けない……
Entry.EnglishText: ...How pathetic...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……やれやれ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Geez...

Entry.JapaneseText: 情報屋ヨッツア様は、 国が混乱してても営業中さ！ 情報を聞いてくかい？
Entry.EnglishText: I deal information even during national emergencies! What would you like to know?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> どの情報にしますか？ お得な無料情報 レアな有料情報 やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>What information would you like? Valuable Free Information Rare Paid Information No Thanks

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、あねさん、自分探しを してるんだってね？ つまり、アレの話だよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, I heard you were trying to discover yourself? You know what I'm talking about, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: おいらも、そっちの話は 詳しくないんだけどさ…… ミリッツァの情報ならあるぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I wouldn't know much about you... But perhaps Militsa might know something?

Entry.JapaneseText: クロダダク砂漠に向かったって 話を聞いたんだ…… あのあたりに何かあるのかもね。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that she went to the Kurodadaku desert... Perhaps there's something around there of interest to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: クロダダク砂漠……
Entry.EnglishText: The Kurodadaku desert...

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、キミはもしかして…… もしかすると……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you might be... Mhm... Perhaps...

Entry.JapaneseText: 聞いたよ聞いたよ。 <Hilda>の姉さんの 生い立ちを調べてるんだってね？
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard all about how <Hilda> is trying to look into her past.

Entry.JapaneseText: それなら、アニカマル辺りに 行ってみたらどうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you try going to the Anikamal area?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァがあっちへ 向かったって情報を聞いたんだ。 何かありそうだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Militsa was heading towards there. Perhaps there might be something of interest?

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル……
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>カレギアの辞書<White>こと、おいら ヨッツア様の情報はイキがいいぜ！ 聞いてくかい？
Entry.EnglishText: I, the <Blue>Callegean Dictionary<White>, have information hot off the presses! What would you like to know?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> どの情報にしますか？ お得な無料情報 レアな有料情報 やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>What information would you like? Valuable Free Information Rare Paid Information No Thanks
